author: nelson iracheta
comment: HORRIBLE REVIEWS LOL!!! TOO SOON TO TELL FOR ME BUT MY FIRST TICKET PURCHASE HERE WAS SUPER FAST,  SLICK AND ALMOST  INSTANT!  NOTHING  COMPARED TO  THE  NIGHTMARISH EXPERIENCE I HAD WHEN I USED VIVIDSEATS....THE FEES  WERE A LITTLE HIGH THOUGH.  I'LL HAVE TO SEE HOW IT WORKS OUT AT THE FRONT  GATE AND FUTURE PURCHASES BUT SO FAR I'M SUPER IMPRESSED!

author: Maco Ruiz
comment: I bought 2 great End Zone tickets for the Copa America USA vs Argentina for $600. yesterday. And like StubHub the tickets were advertised as E-tix... BUT Unlike StubHub I was not able to automatically download the tickets, instead it said I was going to receive an email to print. Waited 2 hours with no email, I called to only get a voice mail & leave a message. This afternoon I get an email saying I was getting a refund because the tix were no longer available. BUT they are still 4 sale w/a higher price.
title: WORST WASTE OF TIME & MONEY

author: nicole caddy
comment: Searching for Raptors tickets...says lots are available. When you click on the event listing that brings up the map there is literally NOTHING showing on the map. Cannot access any tickets to purchase.
title: App literally doesn't work.

author: Lisa Starr
comment: Hefty taxes and fees make tickets almost double what I could have gotten them for at the teams official website. Had trouble finding a way to contact them regarding an issue with my tickets. I would never recommend this service or use it again.

reply.author: Rukkus
reply.content: We apologize for any confusion caused here, Lisa!  As we are a secondary marketplace, it is not at all unusual to see prices listed above or below face value.  Please feel free to reach out if you ever have any questions or concerns!

title: Expensive Tickets

author: Vivian Tang
comment: They sold me tickets for a hockey game, center ice.  After they collected my money those tickets magically weren't available and they tried to replace with seats no where near center ice but told me those seats cost more, like they're doing me a favor. When I realized that it's not what I ordered. I called then out on it. Terrible customer service. Lied about calling me back. I had to contact them to get a response.  Surprise, surprise. Nothing they could do. So I emailed them like I was suggested by their employee. I had their so call manager Patricia yell at me over the phone because I kept emailing them for a response. She was very aggressive. She would not let me talk or talk to her manager when I didn't want to speak to her because she kept yelling at me. She kept cutting me off. She called me a child. Very unprofessional. Super aggressive! After I got off the phone with her, I got a very aggressive email. So that's how they do their business. Sell you something that's not available, then stick you with something you don't want. Never once did anyone give me the option to cancel. But it's my fault, cause I made the mistake purchasing with them.
Made a purchase checkout looks fine but can't seem to find it afterwards, checked with Credit card company and found out they charged me but I didn't get my tickets.

author: Henry Melgarejo
comment: They started charging fees and this has taking their pricing above other apps for the same exact seats.  Doesnt make sense to continue buying from them

reply.author: Rukkus
reply.content: We regret any inconvenience caused here, Henry!  At Rukkus we offer a price match guarantee that states that, if you should find the same set of tickets for a cheaper total cost than Rukkus is offering, we will honor that lower price.  Please let us know if we can offer any assistance!

title: Was wonderful

comment: Worst app and site . Expensive tickets,  no refund policy,  bought tickets and they were suppose to be immediate print out and they were not. Bunch of theives
Deciving, told I was gonna receive 10% off after I sign up with email. Never received, discount! Also can't view electronic ticket  Wich is discouraging.
Stopped working during the search for tickets...tried several times without success. Uninstalling!

author: Cooper Richter
comment: I think my tickets are resold which is OK. The time on the ticket I got was 2:05 when the game is really at 6:30 p.m. hope there was just a time change. Tix were originally purchased on July 14 probably a change since then. Any words rukkus.

reply.author: Rukkus
reply.content: Thanks so much for sharing!  As Rukkus is a secondary marketplace, all tickets listed are being resold and we apologize for any confusion caused by this.  We hope you had a wonderful time at the game!

title: Pretty

author: Jason Dotson
comment: DO NOT USE RUKKUS!!  Rukkus claims they have a "Buyer Guarantee" policy,  however, they did NOT stand by it after I purchased 2 concert tickets for $669. Rukkus failed to produce the 2 tickets I purchased after they realized that the tickets I purchased, that were listed on their website and I called to inquire/verify 3 times before I purchased were supposedly listed wrong??  I had researched several different ticket brokers attempting to get the best seats at the best price and not get taken advantage of.  2 of Rukkus employees verified the tickets that I was interested in & told me about their wonderful "Buyer Guarantee". Both reiterated the company's "Buyer Guarantee" policy, stating that Rukkus would locate another set of equal or similar value tickets, in a comparable location/section to the tickets that I had purchased as replacements if there were any problems with my tickets. RUKKUS claims this on their website, app and 2 of their employees actually told me on the phone. In the end Rukkus did NOT stand by their own guarantee policy, were rude, supervisor refused to let me speak with anyone else and I did not get my tickets!! DO NOT USE THEM!!!

I searched for a week straight to get as close to the field as I could when the Raiders came to play Detroit Lions,  and this site beat evert other site seatgeek, stubhub,  and ticket liquidator came close but not as cheap. Also every site has taxes, and shipping,  and fee's. However on Rukkus not only were the seats cheaper  and the other combined costs were also. Thanks so much

reply.author: Rukkus
reply.content: We truly appreciate your support!  Our biggest priority is customer happiness and we are thrilled that we succeeded.  We look forward to the opportunity to provide you with more great Rukkus experiences!

title: The BEST of The Best!!!

title: Amazing

author: Ray Cheng
comment: I come from the ticketing industry and have been buying and sellong tickets for years. This is hands down the best app and ticketing platform available. Prices are much lower than other sites and Rukkus charges no hidden fees. Highly recommended.
title: Love this app! Cheapest tickets ever.

author: Eddie Stephen
comment: I purchased Denver Nuggets Tickets (Game my kids wanted to take me to for my birthday)  we bought tix 6 rows off floor for $31 each (6 tickets), email came with tickets that were 10 rows further up.    Rukkus told me too bad nothing they would do about it!  The seats i did get were fine, but i could have bought those same tickets for $17 each, so i paid almost double for tickets that should have been much closer.  Only thing they did that i appreciated was call back after my complaint, but their answered was, oops too bad, nothing we are going to do about it.  The Site doesn't have any type of history tracking so really tough to go back and look at what was done or ordered.  Customer Service said if i had a screen print of what i ordered they would be able to do something??  Disappointed, make sure you have a Screen print of your order to avoid any discrepancies.

reply.author: Rukkus
reply.content:
Hi Eddie, 

Per our discussion on the phone, we reviewed your session and found no discrepancy in the order that you placed and the tickets that were delivered. At Rukkus, we strive to make sure all of our customers have a great experience. Unfortunately, we weren't made aware of this until less than hour before the game. However, we do apologize!

title: Sent Wrong row for Tickets, Customer Service told me too bad, did nothing!!

author: charmette and family
comment: This is a great app to have. I haven't brought a ticket yet, but I found some tickets for one event that I really want to attend. I think I will be using this apps more often.
title: Great experience

comment: Didn't end up buying any tickets but this app works well, flows well and is very well organized. You won't be disappointed!
title: Great app, smooth flow!
